bibl.title: The Politeuma in the Hellenistic World (Third to First Century B.C.): A Form of Organisation to Integrate Minorities.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The Sources for and the Location of the politeumata. - 3. Social Origin and Administrative Character of the politeuma. - 4. bibl.title: Migration und Integration - wissenschaftliche Perspektiven aus Österreich. Jahrbuch 2/2013.

bibl.seg: Patrick Sänger, The Politeuma in the Hellenistic World (Third to First Century B.C.): A Form of Organisation to Integrate Minorities.
Julia Dahlvik, Christoph Reinprecht & Wiebke Sievers (edd.), Migration und Integration - wissenschaftliche Perspektiven aus Österreich. Jahrbuch 2/2013 (Wien, 2014) pp. 51-68.

1. Introduction. - 2. The Sources for and the Location of the politeumata. - 3. Social Origin and Administrative Character of the politeuma. - 4. Considerations on the Introduction and the Institutional Evolution of the politeumata. - 5. Conclusion: The Political Function of the politeumata.
